segments.text: My eyes drift to the left, where the real action is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a two-step stool, reaching for a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced quite precariously up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely engrossed in their cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his hand already inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That cookie jar is definitely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clever little scheme they have going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being very sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame their little adventure perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of my own childhood escapades.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
